name: Le Fetiche Maya

However we have juet learnt that Doctor Olrik Karloff, a known rival of Fairbank• hu aleo recently diasappeared. tt is understood that Karloff was intereeted in the recently departed archeologiete work aleo ...
summary: As an intrepid explorer, buy equipments, tools. and head into the wild Yucatan jungles to find the mysterious Mayan fetish. Two modes are available: a platform mode and a 3D mode where the player drives a Jeep.
